Student.title: Student
Student.description: Represents a student in the university system.

firstName.description: The first name of the student.

lastName.description: The last name of the student.

fieldOfStudy.description: The student's field of study or major (filiere).

Class.title: Class
Class.description: Represents a class or course offered by the university.

name.description: The name of the class (e.g., 'Introduction to Programming').

level.description: The academic level of the class (e.g., '100', '200').

fieldOfStudy.description: The field of study to which the class belongs.

studentIds.description: References to Students enrolled in this Class. (Relationship: Class 1:N Student)

definition.description: Stores student profile information. The document ID is a unique ID. Includes fields: firstName, lastName, studentId (matricule), level, fieldOfStudy, status.

params.name: studentId
params.description: The unique identifier of the student document.

definition.description: Stores class information, including the class name, level, field of study, and a list of enrolled student document IDs. Supports efficient class assignment and validation.

params.name: classId
params.description: The unique identifier of the class.
